0.title: front-end web integrator
0.posting:
we’re looking for a front-end web integrator to be part of our growth team in order to design and build rich user-focused experiences that engage and connect with our prospects and customers. you’ll own proxyclick’s web properties and rely on data to influence the design, information architecture, and inbound marketing for proxyclick’s digital properties. you will also work closely with ui/ux designers and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation.

this position is based in our brussels office.

roles and responsibilities

assist in the production of high-quality and innovative responsive websites, landing pages and emails built in the hubspot cos cms
translate ui/ux design wireframes and mockups to actual code and assets(html, css, javascript, css, images, etc) and implement them on proxyclick’s website and other web properties in collaboration with our design team
develop and maintain a ui pattern framework shared across marketing products
build and execute html email marketing campaigns, landing pages, newsletters, and implement a/b tests that will lead to conversion rate improvements
provide assistance to the marketing team to create and update content on hubspot
help prioritize, resolve, and optimize areas of the website that are under-performing

requirements:

2+ years front end development experience in cms integration
knowledge of hubspot cos or similar inbound marketing tools
experience working with jinja, hubl or other templating engines
deep understanding of html, sass/css, javascript, responsive design, cross-browser compatibility and email implementation constraints
experience developing html emails and knowledge of the limitations of this medium
proficient understanding of git and command line tools
comfortable in writing its own automation tools (gulp, grunt, etc)
passionate about online marketing and keeping up-to-date with latest tools, trends and strategies
understanding of and interest in ux principles
strong attention to detail
must have english communication skills, both verbal and written

benefits:

autonomy and empowerment
competitive compensation including stock options
working with a great team of fun and highly motivated people
international culture and learning atmosphere
a relaxed working environment in an amazing office space designed to sit, stand or lounge
an open culture allowing you to share your ideas and have an impact from day one
friday lunch delivered to the office
yearly team event abroad

1.title: junior front-end developer
1.posting:
pour renforcer notre équipe de développement, nous sommes actuellement à la recherche d'un front-end developer junior, plutôt talentueux ! intéressé ?
ps : adresse ton mail à jf, c'est plus sympa que les 'madame, monsieur,'...

ton profil
exceptionnellement motivé et doté d'une belle autonomie
html n'a pas de secret pour toi
ton code est propre, pérenne et organisé !
mobile : first !
un esprit analytique fort : tu peux rapidement appréhender l'essence d'un projet et ses implications
tu connais les principes de l'intégration continue et tu souhaites les mettre en pratique professionnellement
un français irréprochable à l'oral et à l'écrit, un soupçon de néerlandais et un anglais au niveau professionnel
tu es capable de motiver tes co-équipiers et de partager tes connaissances. le partage, c'est la clé !
tu es orienté solution
experience : 1-3 ans (ou moins si tu es une star - impressionne nous !)
the (dream) job
rejoindre une équipe jeune, motivée et aimant les choses bien faites ! grandissons ensemble !
gérer des projets digitaux, de leur analyse à leur livraison, basés sur différents frameworks ou cms, dépendant des spécificités de chaque projet (node, react, wordpress, drupal,...)
avoir ton mot à dire dans l'analyse des projets entrants, tout en gérant les budgets et les timings
devenir un intervenant incontournable dans l'évolution de la société
ce que nous te proposons ?
un cdi temps plein basé à bruxelles - ixelles
un package salarial plus qu'attractif en lien avec ton expérience et tes connaissances, avec de sympathiques avantages extra-légaux
faire partie d'une société en croissance, composée de jeunes talents motivés
un cadre de travail plutôt sympa en plein coeur de bruxelles

2.title: junior front-end developer
2.posting:
veb speelt een cruciale rol in de regie van projecten rond energie-efficiëntie aan een heel diverse groep van
vlaamse overheidsentiteiten (o.a. scholen, zorg- en welzijnssector, sociale huisvesting, centrale
overheidsdiensten,….), waarvan het aantal nog elke dag toeneemt.

binnen veb leeft dan ook een “go for it”-sfeer waar een veertigtal collega’s zich met hart en ziel inzetten om
de gestelde doelen te bereiken.


omwille van deze sterke groei zijn we momenteel op zoek naar een (m/v/x):

junior front-end developer in .net en angular 2


dit is dé uitgelezen kans om vanuit een speerrol de missie van het vlaams energiebedrijf mee te
realiseren: de publieke sector ontzorgen in alle aspecten van energie.

jouw functie
als front-end developer ligt je focus op de ontwikkeling van de user interface van o.a. het
terra-platform.
o gebruikte technologieën/ methodologie zijn
.net core
angular 2
agile development
o andere technologieën waarmee je in aanraking kan komen zijn
cqrsevent sourcingdomain-driven design
amazon web services
postgresql
ms sql server
tableau
jenkins
git
microsoft team services
je maakt deel uit van een gemotiveerd ontwikkelteam waar met actuele technologieën gewerkt wordt.
je krijgt naarmate je ervaring opbouwt meer verantwoordelijkheden binnen het team.



jouw profiel
je beschikt over een bachelor in de informatica of aantoonbare ervaring.
ruimte om jezelf te specialiseren/ontwikkelen in één of meerdere van bovenvermelde technologieën
grijp je met beide handen.
kennis en/of ervaring in één van bovenvermelde technologieën is een plus.
je bent op zoek naar een afwisselende functie die uitdagingen met zich meebrengt. je bent een
teamspeler, helder communiceren vind je evident.
je bent creatief en hebt verantwoordelijkheidszin. je neemt initiatief en biedt kwaliteitsvolle
oplossingen aan.
ons aanbod
wij bieden een afwisselende job in het centrum van de actualiteit (energie en klimaat), in een jong bedrijf
dat bruist van de energie en dat een mooie combinatie maakt tussen economische en maatschappelijke
belangen. wij zijn een vlakke organisatie, vormen een hecht team en geven veel ruimte voor inspraak.
je krijgt een contract van onbepaalde duur en een marktconforme verloning met extralegale voordelen.
wij bieden een maximale flexibiliteit in het vormgeven van je job en hanteren glijdende werkuren.

hoe solliciteren?


stuur je motivatiebrief en cv naar leen.van.gorp@ment.be.

meer weten?


voor meer informatie over deze functie kan je contact opnemen met koen willems, teamleader data:
koen.willems@veb.be of telefonisch via 02 421 32 00.

3.title: front-end creative designer / developer (wordpress)
3.posting:
as an experienced front-end creative designer/developer, some of your key responsibilities will be:
collaborate with other team members — brand, digital, business & strategy — to articulate the best creative and technical solution for the challenges at hand.
design, code, test and iterate from early digital prototypes to live implementation.
refine and optimize existing developments and projects.
define and spread best practices for html/css
define and scale our front end tech stack with the support of the digital lead
requirements
3 or more years of experience with at least 1 year working within a digital agency
demonstrate proficiency and work experience with responsive design
excellent knowledge of html5, css3 (sass/less), webpack/gulp
strong experience with wordpress and woocommerce with a firm understanding of template structure
overall understanding of php
experience with git for source control
your tools of choice for designing, wireframing, prototyping and coding
bonus points
alternative cms driven web publishing experience (craft cms, drupal, etc.)
experience with php frameworks (laravel or symphony)
animation and motion graphics experience
personal attributes
curious and able to constantly learn and keep up with the latest and greatest development technologies
passion for design with strong attention to detail.
great communication skills.
working as a team member but also independent and self-organized.
nice and helpful. our team treats each other like family.
benefits
this is a long term freelance contract role 30-35 hours per week
an informal and open culture within a great office environement
pay range for this role is proportionate to qualifications and experience.
you would work in our office in brussels with up to 1 remote working days/week.
the opportunity to attend events and conferences

4.title: front-end developer

5.title: front end developer (elasticsearch)
5.posting:
job description
intrasoft international, a leading european it solutions provider, is seeking a professional to cover the following opening:
front end developer (elasticsearch)
you will:
architecture and design of front-end/ui layer.
provide data analysis and data modelling.
implement the technical architecture
provide assistance in the testing, the technical documentation, the deployment, the evaluation and the reporting
job requirements
you have:
solid experience in web development in python (both 2.x and 3.x)
front-end technologies (i.e. angularj, html5, css, xml, javascript, jquery)
experience with both relational databases (e.g. postgresql) and search engines (e.g. elasticsearch or solr)
knowledge of rest api development
knowledge of django framework
familiarity with linux and knowledge of basic linux system administration tasks
fluency in english, knowledge of french is an asset
you may have:
data science techniques.
experience in developing complex queries using sql (in particular oracle sql)
knowledge of client web technologies and tools: html, css, xml, javascript, jquery
you are:
problem solver and analytical thinking
excellent in communications and organizational skills
you will get…
competitive compensation package
continuous learning (with the most modern methods), and fast career growth
interesting and challenging work within large scale projects
all applications will be treated as strictly confidential.

apply

6.title: front-end developer

7.title: front-end web developer
7.posting:
your role & work environment

you will be part of dynamic squad working on some of the finest wealth management applications. if you’re passionate about the future of web development and you’re curious about investments, stock markets, trading shares, private banking, etc … look no further!

your team will consist of a mix of people with various skills, both with it and business backgrounds making your day job varied as well as technically enriching, as you will be working alongside other front end experts in an international tech company betting on the web as a platform.

your key responsibilities
analyze and develop new customer facing web applications for ing belgium & the netherlands – with a strong focus on mobile devices.
you are in constant dialogue with your tribe: you understand the goal of our business and work as a team of experts to find the most relevant solution for the customer’s needs.
you are responsible for the technical design, development, testing and delivery.
you are a team player who works together with other experts in your squad.

we look for
a colleague who understands the balance between working autonomously and working together. you listen and invest in others to achieve shared goals. you’re happy to challenge the status quo and are eager to propose creative solutions to problems.
as a front-end engineer, you definitely …

like to code javascript, html & css.
are passionate about web development in general, with a keen interest in the future of the web: es2018, web components, future web api’s, css modules and beyond.
see the difference between a nice web application and a great one that just nails all the details: animations, responsiveness, performance, design, pwa manifest, …
have a strong opinion on js frameworks, web tooling, native … be it positive or negative.
take pride in applications you ship to production.

you will stand out more if you’re experienced with some of the skills & tools below, but they are no hard requirements:
experience in a major front end framework: (p)react, vue, angular, polymer come to mind.
you not only want to learn about the future of the web, you want to be the future of the web.
experience in a large enterprise, working with teams.
the more these words mean something to you, the better: jenkins, nolio, artifactory, gitlab, node, visual code, redux, pwa, lighthouse, grunt, polymer-cli, rest, graphql, react-native, maven, java, scala, …
the mindset to join agile driven projects in a devops squad.
you have an excellent written and spoken knowledge of english; knowledge of any other language is an asset.

any level of experience is welcome. whether you have worked for 10 years in a cutting edge it company, or you are just starting out after school: we will always find you a place according to your skillset & ambitions.

we offer you
a clear purpose, a unique offer and a range of flexible compensation and other benefits.
the ability to exploit your strengths as a software engineer at ing, as well as training the skills you want to improve.
personal growth & challenging work with endless opportunities to realise your ambitions
an informal, dynamic environment with innovative colleagues supporting your endeavours
a progressive and agile way of working, where new ideas are valued ahead of convention. a place where business actually listens to it as well.
a job in a company that has moved/is moving from a traditional bank to a tech company with a banking license.

we redefine banking. what about you?
there has never been a more interesting time to work at ing. we’re on a journey that’s centered around our customers, powered by technology and driven by smart, determined people. our customers feel our people are empowering them to stay a step ahead in life and in business. we’re proud of that!

8.title: front-end developer
8.posting:
nature of the tasks
programming/maintenance of presentation layer of multi-tier applications
design and development of application for mobile devices (tablets, smartphones…)
design and development of user interfaces for pcs, tablets, smartphones
design and development of rich internet applications
user ergonomics
testing of web applications
installation and configuration of web applications
migration and updates of web applications
creation of on-line help in information systems
participation in meetings with project teams
knowledge and skills
good knowledge of the design and development of web applications
good knowledge of web application development frameworks
good knowledge of scripting languages
knowledge of rich internet application technologies
knowledge of web technologies and standards (e.g. html5, xml)
knowledge of relational databases
knowledge of tablet and smartphone applications programming
ability to cope with fast changing technologies used in application developments
ability to participate in multi-lingual meetings, ease of communication
capability of integration in an international/multi-cultural environment, rapid self-starting capability and experience in working in team.
education and experience
minimum 3 years of relevant studies and/ or experience after the secondary school
optional specific expertise
minimum a total of 2 years in one or more of the following: scripting languages (coldfusion, jsp...), web tools and technologies
